name: addEvent

inputs.name: eventId
inputs.description: A unique identifier for the event

inputs.name: unitIds
inputs.description: An array of unit identifiers involved in the event

description: Adds a new event to the contract

name: addUnit

inputs.name: unitId
inputs.description: A unique identifier for the unit

inputs.name: optionKeys
inputs.description: An array of option keys associated with the unit

inputs.name: optionValues
inputs.description: An array of option values associated with the unit

description: Adds a new unit to the contract

name: events

inputs.description: A unique identifier for the event to retrieve

description: Retrieves details of a specific event

name: units

inputs.description: A unique identifier for the unit to retrieve

description: Retrieves details of a specific unit
